seniority_level.evidence: 1+ years experience required, title 'AI Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, responsibilities align with mid-level role (data prep, model deployment, API integration)

job_family.evidence: Title is 'AI Data Engineer', core responsibilities include data pipelines, data transformation, and model deployment - core data engineering functions

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on preparing data for AI/ML models, deploying and monitoring models on Azure, integrating model APIs - clearly ML infrastructure specialization

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role reports to AI Tech Lead, collaborates with senior AI developer, no mention of managing people or leading teams - pure individual contributor role

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure services, Azure ML, Microsoft Fabric, Azure DevOps explicitly mentioned as required skills

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms mentioned in requirements or description

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on data preparation for model training and deployment, no mention of real-time streaming or event-driven architectures

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure DevOps mentioned as required skill, which is Microsoft's cloud-native CI/CD and orchestration platform

storage_layer.evidence: Microsoft Fabric mentioned (which supports both data lake and data warehouse capabilities) and Azure services generally support mixed storage patterns

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Prague, Czechia with hybrid work model - implies must be in Prague region for office days

timezone_focus.evidence: Based in Prague, Czechia - clearly focused on European timezone

relocation_required.evidence: Location specified as Prague with hybrid work model - implies must be able to work from Prague office

h1b_friendly.evidence: Based in Czechia, not US - H1B is US-specific visa, no mention of visa sponsorship for non-EU citizens

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Based in Czechia, OPT/CPT are US student visa programs - not applicable, no mention of student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: No explicit citizenship requirement mentioned, but location in Prague implies must be authorized to work in Czechia

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with comprehensive benefits package (pension, insurance, etc.) typical of W2 employment in Czechia

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits listed including 5 weeks vacation, meal allowance, multisport card, pension contributions, insurance, loans, referral programs - comprehensive package

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'Focus on your development', 'internal & external trainings, certifications, workshops', 'Boost your Potential and Independence' - implies growth opportunities but no specific career tracks

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaborating with 'senior AI developer' and being part of 'AI Competence Center under AI Tech Lead' - implies working with senior team members

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring other roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have skills listed (Python, SQL, Azure services, etc.) with no nice-to-have skills - moderate strictness with specific technical requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role with specific responsibilities: prepare data for AI models, deploy models on Azure, automate workflows, integrate APIs - clear scope

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 1+ years experience required for mid-level role with reasonable skill set (Python, SQL, Azure, AI model experience) - no unrealistic expectations
